CmdLine: set -e       && apt-get -y update       && apt-get -y dist-upgrade       && apt-get -y install --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests         g++ gcc libstdc++-6-dev libxml2-dev make ruby-dev bundler zlib1g-dev       && apt-get -y autoremove       && apt-get clean       && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -e       && echo "source 'https://rubygems.org'" > /tmp/Gemfile       && echo "gem 'github-pages', group: :jekyll_plugins" >> /tmp/Gemfile       && bundle install --gemfile=/tmp/Gemfile --system
Commands.Name: run
